Judul: APPLICATION OF VERY FAST SIMULATED ANNEALING ALGORITHM FOR TIME-LAPSE MICROGRAVITY
Abstrak:
Almost any type of gravity inversion modeling suffers from
the problem of non-uniqueness, especially in time-lapse
microgravity problem. The uncertainty can not be
completely reduced because in general the inverse problem
of geophysics is usually non-linear, so using linear
algorithm can not find optimal solution. In this research, we
present non-linear inversion using a very fast simulated
annealing method to find out the spread of density changes
made in the reservoir. Our technique has been applied to
synthetic data and proven can be identify the location of
density contrast at the reservoir.
Sumber: Geophysical Engineering, Faculty of Mining and Engineering, Institut Teknologi Bandung , Indonesia
